[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519)

This is really, really, really cool. Thanks for sharing! I'm going to take a look at which modules might be useful to add. 

P.S. The design looks great, so even if you didn't design it *I'll never know the difference*. Simple and easy to follow!
